requirements.details: Install tailwindcss@^4, @tailwindcss/vite@^4, and @astrojs/cloudflare. Update astro.config.mjs to use the Tailwind v4 vite plugin and Cloudflare adapter (use `adapter: cloudflare()`, NOT `cloudflare({ mode: 'advanced' })`). Create wrangler.toml with `[assets] directory = "./dist"` (NOT `[site] bucket`). Update package.json: set name to `mynameisjonas-dev`, add deploy script `pnpm build && wrangler deploy`. Update .gitignore to include `.wrangler/` and `.dev.vars`.

requirements.description: Global styles with Tailwind v4 theme
requirements.details:
Create src/styles/global.css with Tailwind v4 @theme block containing the full color palette from onelink. Include:

@theme variables:
- --color-accent: #f97316
- --color-accent-hover: #ea580c
- --color-bg-light: #fafaf9
- --color-bg-dark: #0c0a09
- --color-surface-light: #ffffff
- --color-surface-dark: #1c1917
- --color-text-light: #1c1917
- --color-text-dark: #fafaf9
- --color-text-muted-light: #78716c
- --color-text-muted-dark: #a8a29e

Base styles:
- html { scroll-behavior: smooth }
- body with bg/color from light vars, transition 0.3s ease
- html.dark body with dark vars

View transition CSS:
- ::view-transition-old/new(root) with 0.4s duration
- fade-out/fade-in animation names

Keyframe animations:
- fade-in (opacity 0→1, 0.5s ease-out)
- fade-out (opacity 1→0, 0.5s ease-out)
- fade-in-up (opacity 0 + translateY(20px) → opacity 1 + translateY(0), 0.5s ease-out)
- scale-in (opacity 0 + scale(0.9) → opacity 1 + scale(1), 0.5s ease-out)

Utility classes:
- .animate-fade-in-up { animation: fade-in-up 0.5s ease-out both }
- .animate-scale-in { animation: scale-in 0.5s ease-out both }

Reduced motion:
- @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) disables all animations and view transitions

Stagger delay utilities:
- .delay-0 through .delay-8 (75ms intervals: 0ms, 75ms, 150ms, 225ms, 300ms, 375ms, 450ms, 525ms, 600ms)

requirements.details:
Set up Astro Content Collections for a blog that is hidden from navigation until posts are ready.

1. src/content/config.ts:
- Import { defineCollection, z } from 'astro:content'
- Import { glob } from 'astro/loaders'
- Define blog collection with glob loader: { loader: glob({ pattern: '**/*.{md,mdx}', base: './src/content/blog' }) }
- Schema: z.object({ title: z.string(), description: z.string(), date: z.coerce.date(), tags: z.array(z.string()).default([]), draft: z.boolean().default(false) })
- Export collections = { blog }

2. src/content/blog/.gitkeep:
- Empty file to keep the directory in git

3. src/pages/blog/index.astro:
- Use BaseLayout with title 'Blog — Jonas Eriksson'
- Import { getCollection } from 'astro:content'
- Get blog posts, filter out drafts, sort by date descending
- If no posts: show empty state message ('No posts yet. Check back soon!')
- If posts exist: render list with title, date, description, link to post
- Section title style consistent with other pages

4. src/pages/blog/[...slug].astro:
- Use BaseLayout
- getStaticPaths() that fetches blog collection and maps to slug/entry pairs
- Render post with { Content } = await entry.render()
- Prose styling: max-w-none prose dark:prose-invert for content
- Post header: title (text-3xl font-bold), date formatted, tags as pills
- Back link to /blog

5. Blog nav link:
- Confirm blog link remains commented out in Header.astro (done in TASK-003)
- Add a comment in Header.astro explaining: 'Uncomment when blog posts are ready'
